channel.title: Ssh on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in Ssh on SpiderSoft

item.title: SSH and SFTP tunnels via ProxyCommand
item.description: Recently on CyberCity nice article appeared about using middle server to connect to our destination servers. Most of servers have firewalls which  allow connect only from given pool of IP addresses. So tunnelling is very useful as long we are using it in smart way.
